messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hop/Janitor here, moths and lizards ARE NOT and NEVER WILL be considered humans.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SUIT SENSORS,the CMO is already dead, and I'm betting on the clown killing him.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Half of the crew is already fucking dead, AI may actually be rogue...

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Courtroom.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please visit the merchant ship, the chap is in need of some crew to run it.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Head of Personnel's Office.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Sorry for tazing you chap but Nehemiah was trying to take my shit

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.
